import { Delete, Update } from '@material-ui/icons' import React from 'react' import './show.css' const ShowNoteList = (props) => { const { title, content, onClickDelete, onClickUpdate, id, } = props return (

Title : {title}

Content : {content}

) } export default ShowNoteList
